Jx.Field.Radio

Extends: Jx.Field

This class represents a radio input field.

Example

Summary
Jx.Field.RadioExtends: Jx.Field
Options
templateThe template used to create this field
checkedwhether this radio button is checked or not
Functions
renderCreates a radiobutton input field.
setValueSets the value property of the field
getValueReturns the current value of the field. 



Options



template
The template used to create this field



checked
whether this radio button is checked or not



Functions



render
render: function ()
Creates a radiobutton input field.



setValue
setValue: function (v)
Sets the value property of the field
Parameters
vThe value to set the field to, “checked” it should be checked.



getValue
getValue: function ()
Returns the current value of the field.  The field must be “checked” in order to return a value.  Otherwise it returns null.









Extends: Jx.Widget
render: function ()
Creates a radiobutton input field.
setValue: function (v)
Sets the value property of the field
getValue: function ()
Returns the current value of the field.
